mapper.sql: SELECT LRAPPLICATION_ID, LRAPPLICATION_TYPE, LRAPPLICATION_START_DATE, LRAPPLICATION_FINISH_DATE, LRAPPLICATION_STATE, STU_ID FROM LEAVERETURNAPPLICATION
mapper.insert:
SELECT LRAPPLICATION_ID_SEQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO LEAVERETURNAPPLICATION VALUES(#{LRApplicationId}, #{LRApplicationType}, #{LRApplicationStartDate}, #{LRApplicationFinishDate}, #{LRApplicationState}, #{stuId})
mapper.update: UPDATE LEAVERETURNAPPLICATION SET LRAPPLICATION_TYPE=#{LRApplicationType}, LRAPPLICATION_START_DATE=#{LRApplicationStartDate}, LRAPPLICATION_FINISH_DATE= (SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) FROM DUAL), LRAPPLICATION_STATE=#{LRApplicationState}, STU_ID=#{stuId} WHERE LRAPPLICATION_ID=#{LRApplicationId}
mapper.select: SELECT l.LRAPPLICATION_ID, l.LRAPPLICATION_TYPE, l.LRAPPLICATION_START_DATE, l.LRAPPLICATION_STATE, u.users_name, u.users_id, m.major_name FROM leavereturnapplication l, users u, student s, major m WHERE l.stu_id = s.stu_id AND s.stu_id = u.users_id AND s.major_id = m.major_id AND l.LRAPPLICATION_STATE = '대기' ORDER BY l.LRAPPLICATION_START_DATE
